BasicInfo.short: Thoughtful productivity software that empowers you to focus on what matters.

Products.name: Boomerang for Outlook
Products.description: Boomerang works like a snooze button for your email.

Products.name: Boomerang for Android
Products.description: The most powerful email app for Android, currently integrates with Gmail, Google Apps, and Microsoft Exchange accounts

Products.name: Boomerang Calendar
Products.description: Boomerang Calendar is a smart calendar assistant for Gmail

Products.name: Inbox Pause
Products.description: Inbox Pause is a free Chrome extension allowing users to schedule email in Gmail, send email later, set email reminders in Gmail, and more.
